tasks.title: Fix MinHash/LSH Similarity Detection Algorithm
tasks.description: Implement fix for similarity clustering algorithm to detect files with >70% similarity across marketplaces, addressing GitHub #11
tasks.details: Debug MinHash/LSH implementation to correctly identify 98% identical files. Adjust threshold logic, improve shingling for Claude Code plugins, ensure cross-marketplace indexing works. Add known duplicate test data (136/139 skills). Use datasketch library for MinHashLSH with bands/buckets optimized for 70% Jaccard similarity threshold.
tasks.testStrategy: Create test suite with 139 known duplicate files from claude-scientific-skills vs ecosystem. Verify 0 files -> 136+ files in clusters. Test edge cases: 70%, 69%, 71% similarity. Measure recall >95% on known duplicates.

tasks.title: Add Sanity Checks for Similarity Results
tasks.description: Implement statistical improbability detection and confidence indicators for similarity results, GitHub #12
tasks.details: Add validation rules: flag 0% cluster membership when >1000 clusters exist; warn on similarity ratios <5% or >95% for datasets >500 files. Compute confidence scores based on dataset size, cluster density. Output JSON with 'confidence' and 'warnings' fields.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with large datasets (1000+ files): verify flags trigger on 0% overlap, extreme ratios. Validate confidence indicators scale with dataset size. Check warning messages appear in CLI/JSON output.

tasks.title: Implement Progress Feedback for Long Operations
tasks.description: Add progress bars and ETA for scanning/indexing operations, GitHub #2
tasks.details: Use tqdm or rich progress bars for file scanning, MinHash computation, LSH indexing. Track files processed/total, estimate ETA based on avg processing time. Add completion messages. Integrate with all long-running CLI commands.
tasks.testStrategy: Run on 1000+ file datasets, verify progress updates every 10-50 files, ETA accuracy within 20%, completion message appears. Test interrupt handling preserves partial progress.

tasks.title: Add Content Diff View for Similar Files
tasks.description: Display meaningful differences between similar files beyond similarity percentage, GitHub #3
tasks.details: Integrate difflib or rich.diff for side-by-side file comparison. Ignore whitespace/formatting differences using normalize_whitespace(). Highlight semantic changes (function names, logic). Output to terminal with color coding and JSON diff format.
tasks.testStrategy: Test pairs with 70-99% similarity: verify diff ignores whitespace, highlights code changes. Validate 95%+ identical files show minimal diff. Check terminal rendering and JSON export.

tasks.title: Implement Marketplace-to-Marketplace Comparison
tasks.description: Add command to directly compare two marketplaces (A vs B) showing overlap/unique content, GitHub #1
tasks.details: New CLI command: `plugin-librarian compare --marketplace-a <A> --marketplace-b <B>`. Compute intersection (shared clusters), A-only, B-only using set operations on LSH fingerprints. Output Venn diagram stats and top overlaps.
tasks.testStrategy: Test known overlapping marketplaces: verify shared/unique counts match manual inspection. Edge case: identical marketplaces (100% overlap), disjoint (0% overlap). Performance test on large datasets.

tasks.title: Add Marketplace-Level Similarity Queries
tasks.description: Enable similarity analysis aggregated at marketplace level rather than individual files, GitHub #4
tasks.details: Aggregate file-level clusters by marketplace_id. Compute marketplace similarity matrix using average/weighted cluster overlap. New output mode: `--marketplace-level`. Generate heatmap or similarity scores between all marketplace pairs.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify aggregation: marketplace scores match file-level averages. Test with known marketplace overlaps. Validate matrix symmetry and diagonal=1.0.

tasks.title: Improve similarity_report.json Structure and Queryability
tasks.description: Restructure JSON output for better programmatic access and querying, GitHub #5
tasks.details: Flatten nested structures, add marketplace/file indices, similarity_matrix field, cluster_membership array. Follow JSON Schema best practices. Add jq-friendly paths. Include metadata (threshold, timestamp, confidence).
tasks.testStrategy: Validate JSON schema compliance. Test jq queries for common use cases (clusters by marketplace, top similarities). Verify backward compatibility with existing parsers.

tasks.title: Implement Semantic Capability Search
tasks.description: Add search by skill functionality/capability using semantic analysis, GitHub #6
tasks.details: Extract capability descriptions from skill metadata/code comments using regex/NLP. Use sentence-transformers for semantic embeddings. Add `--semantic-search 'query'` command with cosine similarity ranking. Index capabilities during scan.
tasks.testStrategy: Test queries like 'scientific computing', 'data analysis' return relevant skills. Verify ranking correlates with manual relevance. Performance test on full ecosystem.

tasks.title: Add Describe Command for Skill Introspection
tasks.description: Create `describe` command to analyze and summarize individual skills, GitHub #7
tasks.details: Parse skill file: extract name, description, dependencies, capabilities from code/metadata. Generate human-readable summary. Detect input/output types, complexity score. Output formatted CLI view and JSON.
tasks.testStrategy: Test on diverse skills: verify extracts correct metadata, generates accurate summaries. Edge cases: minimal skills, complex multi-function skills.

tasks.title: Implement Checkout Command for Local Skill Copy
tasks.description: Add command to download/copy skills for local development/modification, GitHub #8
tasks.details: `plugin-librarian checkout <skill_id> [dir]`. Clone from marketplace repo or download raw files. Preserve metadata. Handle multiple versions if available. Add to local cache for offline work.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify downloads complete files with correct metadata. Test from different marketplaces. Validate local cache works offline. Check file permissions/ownership.

tasks.title: Extract Shared Core Architecture for Plugin Toolkit
tasks.description: Refactor common components into shared core library for plugin-toolkit ecosystem, GitHub #9
tasks.details: Identify shared modules: MinHashLSH, marketplace parsers, CLI framework, JSON schemas. Create `plugin-librarian-core` package. Update main tool to use core. Design for extensibility (custom marketplaces, similarity metrics).
tasks.testStrategy: Verify core library passes all existing tests independently. Test main tool uses core without regression. Validate extensibility with mock marketplace.
